content: frankie s knitted stuff pocket ted pocket ted is only 8 cm / 3 tall and sleeps in his own knitted bed in a tin what more could anyone want the tins the tins i used measure about 9 5 × 6 cm and are 2 cm deep 3¾ × 2¼ ¾ deep in the uk strong mints are sold in this sort of tin if you can t find a tin of the right size just the teddy and his bed would make a nice gift yarn pocket ted is knitted with thin yarn on 2 mm / us size 0 needles working to a gauge of about 9 stitches and 12 row to 2 5 cm / 1 ² in stocking stitch i used rowan felted tweed 175 m / 50 g shades 157 light and 160 dark his bed and the knitted cover for the tin are both worked on 2 75 mm / us size 2 needles using 4 ply sock yarn i knitted to a gauge of about 14 stitches and 28 row to 5 cm / 2 ² using garter stitch other bits and bobs pocket ted s legs and arms are lined with pipe cleaners so that he can sit up i used the thicker fluffy ones you will also need double sided tape to stick the knitted cover to the tin and perhaps a button or two to decorate it pocket ted the head body and legs are worked in one piece beginning with the legs legs and body using the long tail method and 2 mm needles cast on five stitches leave a long enough tail to close the leg seam later row 1 purl row 2 k1 *m1 k1 repeat from * to end 9 sts work nine row in stocking stitch starting with a purl row cut the yarn and leave the stitches on the needle cast on another five stitches on the empty needle and work another leg in the same way don t cut the yarn next row k9 k9 stitches from the first leg 18 sts starting with a purl row work 11 row in stocking stitch for the body head row 1 *k1 k2tog repeat from * to end 12 sts row 2 purl row 3 k2 m1 k2 m1 k4 m1 k2 twice 16 sts row 4 purl row 5 knit row 6 purl row 7 k2 m1 k4 three times m1 k2 20 sts row 8 purl row 9 knit row 10 purl row 11 *k2 k2tog repeat from * to end 15 sts row 12 purl row 13 *k1 k2tog repeat from * to end 10 sts row 14 p2tog five times 5 sts cut the yarn leaving a tail for sewing up and thread through the remaining five stitches sew the head seam and stuff the head lightly using the cast on ends gather the bottom of the feet and close the leg seams for each leg cut a 10 cm
